item.description:
This looks like an interesting Americana (roots rock) band from Boston playing in a small venue in Nashua. On their myspace page, they describe their sound as "Bluegrass with an edge, Country that doesn't suck, Rock that melts your face." Sounds good to me.

Band Members: Kier Byrnes (banjo/mandolin/harp/guitar), Colt Thompson (lead guitar), Johnny Stump (bass), Eric Austin (drums)

• Winner: 2007 WBZ TV “A-List” Arts and Entertainment Award for “Best Stage Presence”
• Winner: 2004 and 2003 Boston Music Award, Outstanding Roots Act (also nominated in 2005 & 2007 for “Outstanding Americana Act”).
• Winner: 2003, 2004 and 2006 WFNX/Boston Phoenix Music Poll, "Best Roots Act".

For more info check out www.myspace.com/threedaythreshold
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell# to attendees and we'll meet there
item.name: Three Days Threshold
